BLOGS.thumb nail: a new thumb nail added for each blog
BLOGS.save it: a blog can be saved in BLOG_SAVE table
BLOGS.saved & starred: a saved blog can be starred at the client side
BLOGS.share link: a share link is added to each blog
BLOGS.add image: an image can be added to each blog
BLOGS.category: there is a category for each blog
BLOGS.created - updated timings: created and updated timings are added
BLOGS.view count: no. of users visited is counted

REACTIONS.create new: new reaction added ex: like, smile emojis etc
REACTIONS.blog reaction: each blog can have reaction for users to react
REACTIONS.comment reaction: each comment can have reaction for users to react
REACTIONS.reply reaction: a comment can have replies, those replies can have reaction for users to react

COMMENTS.create new: new comment can be added under each blog
COMMENTS.created - updated timings: each comment can be updated and the corresponding time is noted
COMMENTS.user who commented: any user can commnet on a specific blog
COMMENTS.reaction to a comment: can add any reaction for a comment by the other users

REPLY.create new: a new reply can be added under a comment
REPLY.reaction: can react to the reply of a user by the others
REPLY.created - updated time: can create and update the replies and time is noted.

TAGS.create new: a ne tag is added like, #technology etc..
TAGS.post has tags: each post can have the multiple tags

SAVED_POSTS.save a blog: can save a post by the user
SAVED_POSTS.star a blog: saved blog can be starred by the saved user
SAVED_POSTS.saved time: saved time is noted by the users.
